faq.title: Details & Logistics.
faq.cantFind: Can't find what you're looking for?

questions.question: Why a monthly subscription instead of project-based?
questions.answer: Project-based work often punishes efficiency. Our subscription model aligns our incentives with yours: delivering high-quality work fast. It eliminates scope creep negotiations and allows us to iterate continuously on your product.

questions.question: How fast is the turnaround time?
questions.answer: On average, requests are delivered in 48-72 hours. Complex tasks like full landing pages or complex logic might take longer, but we break them down into deliverable milestones so you see progress every few days.

questions.question: What if I don't like the design?
questions.answer: We iterate until you are obsessed. Period. Our subscription includes unlimited revisions. We don't stop until the work is world-class.

questions.question: What tech stack do you use?
questions.answer: We specialize in the modern web. For marketing sites, we use Webflow or Framer for speed and editability. For apps and complex platforms, we build with React, Next.js, and TypeScript tailored to your needs.

questions.question: Is there a refund policy?
questions.answer: Due to the high-quality nature of the work, we do not issue refunds once work has commenced. However, you can pause or cancel your subscription at any time to avoid future charges.

testimonials.title: Client Obsession.
testimonials.subtitle: We don't just collect logos. We collect success stories. Here is what happens when you work with the best.

items.quote: Kelme Studio didn't just build a website; they architected a digital flagship. Our conversion rates doubled within the first month of launch. The authority we now command in our market is undeniable.
items.author: Alex Rivera

items.quote: I've worked with top agencies in NYC and London. Diego's team operates at a different frequency. Faster, sharper, and obsessively detailed. They understand that design is a revenue function.
items.author: Sarah Jenkins

items.quote: The ROI was immediate. They simplified our complex ecosystem into a seamless user journey. A masterclass in execution that positioned us exactly where we needed to be: at the top.
items.author: Marcus Chen

contact.formSubtitle: Tell us about your project and how we can help transform your vision into reality.
contact.aboutProjectPlaceholder: Tell us about your project with as much detail as possible
contact.signNDA: I would like to sign an NDA
contact.privacyNotice: By submitting the form, I agree to the
contact.successMessage: Thank you! We received your message and will get back to you soon.
contact.errorMessage: Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form. Please try again.
contact.ceoPitch: Have questions or curious about future possibilities? Feel free to reach out to me directly.
contact.officesDescription: We serve clients throughout Brazil from our base in Florianópolis.
contact.testimonial1Text: Kelme Studio delivered exceptional design that truly captured the essence of our brand. The team was professional from start to finish and understood exactly what we wanted.
contact.testimonial2Text: Working with the Kelme team was an incredible experience. They not only met the deadline but exceeded our expectations with creative ideas and innovative solutions.
contact.testimonial3Text: The dedication and attention to detail from the Kelme Studio team was impressive. They transformed our vision into reality and created a website that truly represents our brand.
contact.faqDescription: Answers to the most common questions about our services and work process.
contact.faq1Question: What services does Kelme Studio offer?
contact.faq1Answer: We offer a complete range of digital services, including website and app development, UI/UX design, branding, digital marketing, and content strategy. Our goal is to create digital solutions that help drive your business.
contact.faq2Question: How does the work process work?
contact.faq2Answer: Our process begins with an initial consultation to understand your needs. Then we develop a customized strategic plan, followed by design, development, testing, and launch phases. We maintain clear and transparent communication throughout the project.
contact.faq3Question: How long does it take to complete a project?
contact.faq3Answer: Completion time varies according to the complexity and scope of the project. A simple website can take a few weeks, while more complex projects can take several months. We provide a detailed time estimate after our initial consultation.
contact.faq4Question: How is the project cost determined?
contact.faq4Answer: The cost is based on the complexity, scope, and timeline of the project. Factors such as number of pages, custom features, exclusive design, and system integrations affect the price. We offer a transparent and detailed budget after our initial consultation.
contact.faq5Question: Do you offer support after launch?
contact.faq5Answer: Yes, we offer ongoing support and maintenance packages after launch. This includes security updates, bug fixes, minor improvements, and performance monitoring to ensure your project continues to function perfectly.

hook.title: I don't sell pretty websites.
hook.subtitle: People don't buy from me because I know code. They buy from me because I engineer reality-bending sales funnels.
hook.text1: If you are looking for a "yes man" to build a template, close this tab.
hook.text2: My clients partner with me because they know one thing: I double revenue.
hook.text3: I deliver digital products so dopaminergic, with copy so visceral and design so aggressive, that it doesn't just attract leads—it fascinates them. It converts violently. From complex nutraceuticals to high-load SaaS applications, I build engines for scalability.

philosophy.label: The Philosophy
philosophy.title:
Code is Cheap.
Psychology is Expensive.
philosophy.text1: Most agencies focus on the tool. I focus on the mind.
philosophy.text2: Every pixel I place and every line of code I write serves a singular purpose: Scaling the Offer.
philosophy.text3: I operate at the intersection of IEEE-standard engineering precision and raw human emotion. Whether it's a high-ticket funnel or a mobile app, the goal is to trigger a biological response in the user. We don't want them to just browse; we want them to feel a compulsion to act.

ventures.label: Skin in the Game
ventures.title:
I don't just build for clients.
I build businesses.

zarpy.name: Zarpy
zarpy.description: Revolutionizing logistics and mobility. We don't just move things; we engineer the flow of commerce.

pppi.name: PPPI
pppi.description: High-level industrial solutions. Complex engineering meets digital efficiency.

pandami.name: Pandami
pandami.description: A digital ecosystem built for scale. From MVP to market dominance.

fromAcre.title: From Acre to Floripa
fromAcre.description: Born in Acre, forged in resilience. I moved to Florianópolis, Brazil's Silicon Island, to immerse myself in the heart of technology. This journey from the deep Amazon to a tech capital defines my approach: grounded, resilient, yet relentlessly futuristic.

ieee.title: IEEE Standards
ieee.description: I support and adhere to IEEE (Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers) standards. My work isn't just "creative"; it's engineered. It's built on protocols that ensure stability, security, and scalability.

pillars.title: The Unseen Pillars
pillars.description: My leadership is quietly guided by the principles of the Order of DeMolay—loyalty, comradeship, and fidelity. Spiritually, I find balance in Spiritism, which keeps my ego in check and my empathy for the end-user high. I build for people, not just for metrics.

founder.name: Diego Kelme.
paragraphs: If you've navigated the digital landscapes of Orlando, Porto, or Florianópolis, you've likely seen my work... even if you didn't know it was me.
I'm the guy big brands call when "good enough" stops converting.
While I'm notably known as the Tech Lead who simplifies the complex...
I'm also the leader of a complete elite squad. We are a team of senior designers and developers who move faster than agencies ten times our size.
founder.quote: I know that sounds bold. But in a world of templates and AI-generated noise, authority is the only currency that matters.
founder.closingParagraph: My real journey began with a single obsession: How do we merge perfect code with perfect design to build not just websites, but revenue engines?
